description:
Heine Westenfluss is a Coordinator ZAFT pilot, who piloted a ZGMF-1001 Blaze ZAKU Phantom before becoming the pilot of the ZGMF-X2000 GOUF Ignited. His last name, Westenfluss, is German for west river.
Heine joined ZAFT on February 21, CE 68 and was considered an ace pilot. In addition to wearing a red uniform, given to pilots who had graduated at the top of their class, he also wore FAITH insignia, indicating his membership in that unit; as a result, he reported directly to Chairman Gilbert Durandal. Prior to the events of Gundam SEED Destiny, Heine fought in the Bloody Valentine War (in particular the Second Battle of Jachin Due) as a pilot for the Hawkins team, piloting the YFX-600R GuAIZ Experimental Firearms Type and battling against Earth Alliance ace Morgan Chevalier.
name: Heine Westenfluss
